snippet: The exodus deprives Syria of a demographic crucial to reconstruction while threatening to create a new underclass in Europe.
abstract: Waves of young men fleeing Syria and other countries for Europe bring both promise of economic growth to host countries and threat of economic strain and further radicalization if assimilation is mismanaged; many migrants are unskilled or speak no European languages, leaving Europe with responsibility of training them.

byline.contributor: Karam Shoumali contributed reporting from Izmir, Turkey.

lead_paragraph: The exodus deprives Syria of a demographic crucial to reconstruction while threatening to create a new underclass in Europe.

headline.main: Waves of Young Syrian Men Bring Hope, and a Test, to Europe
headline.print_headline: Waves of Young Syrian Men Bring Hope, and a Test, to Europe

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and Africa Migrant Crisis
